Package org.openstreetmap.osm.data.coordinates

Provides basic classes for working with coordinates in OpenStreetMap-data

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bounds This is a simple data class for "rectangular" areas of the world, given in lat/lon min/max values.
Coordinate Base class of points of both coordinate system.
EastNorth Northern, Easting of the projected coordinates.
GpsPoint This class represents a single gps-reading.
LatLon LatLon are unprojected latitude / longitude coordinates.
PolygonBounds (c) 2007 by

Package org.openstreetmap.osm.data.coordinates Description

Provides basic classes for working with coordinates in OpenStreetMap-data.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • LibOSM in the TravelingSalesman-Wiki
  • OpenStreetMap
  • Osmosis

See Also:
LatLon, Bounds
